name: Sunset Dawn
description:
It's a showdown between two gunslingers on either side of the law. Who has the quickest trigger, and who has the sharpest aim? With only six bullets, every missed shot counts.

Controls

Gamepads are required.
Jump with the left trigger, shoot with the right.
Use the left stick to move, and the right stick to aim.

Credits

  • Devin Hilpert
  • Greg Weil
